name: Frog power
description:
So you decided to play this game

Good choise! This is an action-puzzle game about a frog eating bugs. 40 awesome and a bit difficult levels will challenge your quick problem solving and aiming skills. Nothing much to say more about it. Made for Mini Game Jam with love and sweat.

How to play it then?

Your task is to destroy all colored bugs before the time runs out. Your frog shoots lasers in a straight line. You must eliminate all of the same colored bugs in one shot. One shot must touch only the bugs of one color (that is very important!). Do not try to shoot black wasps. They will disappear on their own. You should complete all screens to finish the game. Every completed screen will reward you with some more time.

Controls
  • Left mouse button - shoot laser to the indicated point
  • Right mouse button - jump to the indicatedpoint
  • Escape - exit to main menu \ close the game
Tips and tricks

You can't spam lasers, there is a 0.3 second recharge. Color of your laser indicates the result of your shot. White - no bugs were touched / not all the bugs of the same color were touched / bugs of different colors were touched. Black - wasp was touched. Colored - successfull elimination of bugs. Analyzing and memorizing the patterns is key to victory. There is always a way to beat level consistently, you just need to fugure out how.
